amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to replace the original text with language stating that not inconsistent with the first article of amendment to the Constitution, the Congress shall have power to prohibit the physical desecration of the flag of the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to propose the following article as an amendment to the Constitution of the United States: "Not inconsistent with the first article of amendment to this Constitution, the Congress shall have power to prohibit the physical desecration of the flag of the United States".

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Watt (NC).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt (NC) amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 115 - 310 (Roll no. 251).
